file_content.text: Don't let your guard down in open space. Never know what's out there.
Flight Commander Pirul, my lord. If you possess a ship, I could certainly use your talents.
Flight Commander Pirul, sir. I hear you're quite the pilot--just what we need.
Hunter, good, we need every ship we can get.
Flight Commander Pirul. And you have a ship, I see. Excellent.
The Republic grows bolder. Their attack squadrons ambush Imperial targets and disappear into open space. We're struggling to compete.
We must remind the Republic who controls the galaxy.
Make them fear the Empire.
I'm doing everything in my power, my lord.
Soon we'll dispense with this foolish stalemate and have our war.
Finally our conflict heats up.
Precisely, my lord. But in the short term, we must respond with force.
The Republic's testing our response time, our fleet's strength. We can't display a single weakness.
We must retaliate.
Agreed, sir. Longer we wait, the greater their advantage.
Sounds like the Empire needs my help. Again.
And you want to hire me.
Correct. We're placing an open bounty on this Republic scum.
Why would the Republic risk war over these space skirmishes?
What's their purpose?
Open warfare's just around the corner. They're likely probing us for weaknesses, readying for battle.
Dogfights aren't my concern.
These attacks weaken our grip on the galaxy. In that respect, they weaken you, too.
I've scrambled the Kaas Twenty-third and Dread Wing, but it's not enough. We're forming an exclusive response squadron: the Empire's Fury.
With a Sith of your power leading the squadron, we'd crush the Republic in record time.
Considering your impressive skills, I hoped you would serve as squadron leaders.
According to your skill sets, I'm nominating you for squadron leader. Care to help our fleet rout the Republic?
I will proudly lead the Empire's Fury.
It would be my honor.
If I'm representing the Imperial fleet, I think I deserve something extra.
What does squadron leader pay?
I'm authorized to dispense a generous signing bonus. Your call sign will be "Scree."
Prepare for a show.
Get ready for fireworks.
Anything to get out of here.
Excellent, my lord. Your call sign will be "Tempest."
Fantastic, my lord. Your call sign will be "Rage."
Appreciated, sir. Your call sign will be "Nightshrike."
Wonderful, hunter. Your call sign will be "Scree."
Good to have you, Fury Leader.
Uploading mission data to your ship now. You'll work alone while the rest of the squadron assists throughout the galaxy.
Strike with fury, strike for the Empire.
We need ships in the air six hours ago.
